Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer correctly determined that the applicant's husband was subject to an enforceable removal order
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Evidence showing removal order was deferred, not stayed
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Applicant claimed removal order was stayed
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Deferral by CBSA does not equate to a stay; removal order remained enforceable
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: s.113(1)(e) of Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decision
Crimes.Application_Factor: Inclusion of spouse subject to enforceable removal order
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Husband subject to enforceable removal order
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that removal order was stayed

Crimes.Violation_Type: Ineligibility due to family member under enforceable removal order
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the officer erred in refusing permanent residence due to enforceable removal order and whether procedural fairness was breached
Crimes.Governing_Law: IRPA and Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant’s husband subject to enforceable removal order; deferral granted, not stay
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Applicant seeking permanent residency under live-in caregiver class
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Immigration officer applied statutory ineligibility provision correctly
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Challenge to officer’s interpretation of enforceability and procedural fairness
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Enforceability of removal order despite deferral
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Documentation of removal order and CBSA deferral
Crimes.Application_Basis: Statutory bar to inclusion of family member under enforceable removal order
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Existence and status of removal order
Crimes.Governing_Rule: s.113(1)(e) – ineligibility if family member subject to enforceable removal order
Crimes.Cause_Description: Applicant added husband with enforceable removal order to PR application
Crimes.Residency_Compliance: Failure to meet eligibility criteria for live-in caregiver class
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Removal order was enforceable as not stayed
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Statutory requirement unmet; officer acted reasonably
